column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////my go-to tapas spot in the city is cafe iberico. i'd heard lots of great things about ba-ba-reeba
column2: so i was eager to check it out. i like the ambience. i think it's very fun for a group or a date. when i went
column3: we had the passion fruit sangria. it was fine
column4: but didn't taste like there was any liquor in it. i would have to taste their other sangrias to be fair
column6: cafe iberico is my preferred choice. the tapas we had were tasty and the desserts
column7: as well. our waiter was great. i would definitely be willing to come back.
